hopobject.name: djvideomixer
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; de; rv:1.9.0.13) Gecko/2009073022 Firefox/3.0.13 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
hopobject.body: This is a small, Touch LCD controlled DJ Mixer, which not only is great as a nightclub tool for playing audio -not only reproducing music, actually playing with it-, but also has high end video playback capabilities, thus making it an all-round experience both for the DJ and the audience.
hopobject.shortdesc: DJ audio mixer with video playback capabilities
